title: Summary
description:
I'm a dynamic out of control free spirit that enjoys long walks in the park, playing video games on a sunny day, and making lists of 3 things. I don't enjoy baseball, the charleston, or pygmies.

This is what is called an informal resume so not only do you get to learn a bout my skills but you get to see my bubbly personality. Please enjoy but like planet fitness this is a no judgement zone so give positive feed back and constructuive critism is not welcome. Happy thoughts

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.content:
• Managed and maintained Web application, VData, in ASP.Net, JQuery, MVC 3, CSS, Ajax and HTML
  • Adding new features to Vdata sites using SQL ASP.NET
  • Worked in teams of 2 and independently

experience.title: Associate Developer
experience.content:
• Designed Websites using Sitecore
  • Generated Sitemap using the Sitecore Framework
  • Used Node.Js and grunt to generate pages for Sitecore
  • Created Page that converted Excel spreadsheet to Sitecore Layouts
  • Designed page that imported excel document and transformed data to Sitecore items
  • Used Nunit to write unit tests
  • Developed websites with Sitecore using Virtual Machines
